name: Cellular automata 2020
description:
a cellular automata with HP for the cells, and 4 cell types:


food

empy

dead

alive

food feeds the living cells, and dead can be eaten or rot and disapear in 2 turns, living cells attack their neighbors

A unique cellular automata

Made after the death of John Horton Conway  - the creator of game of life

-- it's a 0 players game! you do nothing! --
